songs.title: Come Home To Me
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
Come home to me
Come home to me
Back into my arms
Home where you belong
Come home to me
Come home to me
If home is where you are
Then home is way to far away

[Verse one]
T.V light blue and white
I just can't fall asleep tonight
Move over to the space where you should be
Even after you seem so far
Over mountains and diamond stars
Everybody has their own way home

[Hook]
Come home to me
Come home to me
Back into my arms
Home where you belong
Come home to me
Come home to me
If home is where you are
Then home is way too far away

[Verse two]
All my life I’ve dreamed of love
Never thought it would hurt this much
Kiss goodbye await for your return
Oh whoa
So I’ll be strong and hold onto
The picture and the thought of you
Getting all the love that you deserve

[Hook]
Come home to me
Come home to me
Back into my arms
Home where you belong
Come home to me
Come home to me
If home is where you are
Then home is way too far away

[Instrumental]

[Outro]
If home is where you are
Home is way too far away
